Name: James Dundas , Lord Arniston
Notability: Lord of Session and Shire Commissioner to the Scottish Parliament

Name: Duncan McNeill
Notability: Advocate ; judge ; Tory politician ; Lord Justice General ; Lord President of the Court of Session

Name: Ronald Mackay
Notability: Lawyer and judge of the College of Justice , sitting in the Inner House of the Court of Session

Name: W. Douglas Cullen
Notability: Senior member of the Scottish judiciary , served as Lord Justice General and Lord President of the Court of Session

Name: George Dempster
Notability: Advocate , landowner , agricultural improver , politician ; served as MP for the Perth Burghs ; founded the bank George Dempster & Co. ; director of the East India Company ; provost of the town of St Andrews ; director of the Highland Society ; key figure of the Scottish Enlightenment

Name: William Kirk Dickson
Notability: Advocate ; librarian ; writer ; Keeper of the Advocates ' Library ; Librarian of the National Library of Scotland

Name: William Lamb
Notability: Cleric , lawyer , author , senator at the College of Justice

Name: George Mackenzie
Notability: Lawyer , Lord Advocate , and legal writer

Name: Robert Moray
Notability: Statesman , diplomat , judge , spy , freemason , natural philosopher , known for his role in the founding of the Royal Society
